resources.string: Masters of precision, Assassins are agile hunters on the lookout for the perfect kill.
A balance of power and defense, Fighters are born to brawl, preferring their bouts up close and personal.
Aggressive casters, Mages seek to destroy opponents through a range of mystical attacks, spells and abilities.
Ranged fighters, Marksmen are powerful but fragile. While they rely on their team to soak up damage, teams rely on them to deal it.
Stalwart defenders, Supports control the battlefield by augmenting allies and locking down enemies.
Resilient bruisers, Tanks excel at shrugging off blows that would obliterate lesser allies.
Guardian gods are usually melee ranged and utilize Magical Power to boost the strength of their basic attacks and abilities
Warrior gods are typically melee and utilize Physical Power to boost the strength of their basic attacks and abilities
Hunter gods are typically ranged and utilize Physical Power to boost the strength of their basic attacks and abilities
Mage gods are typically those with ranged attacks that utilize Magical Power to boost the potency of their basic attacks and abilities.
Assassin gods are usually melee and utilize Physical Power to boost their basic attacks and abilities.
One of the three primary attributes with the theme of defending against magic damage
One of the three primary attributes that grants attack speed and armor to every hero
One of the three primary attributes with the theme of improving spell-casting
